321310.name: Zen Fish SIM
321310.description:
Relax and rediscover your Zen with Zen: Fish Sim for PC and Linux.

This unique experience is the perfect solution for the stressful day. Become lost in the underwater wonderland; relax your mind and body with the smooth grooves and rediscover your soul.

Whilst you are at it, you can learn about the wide variety of the creatures of the ocean.

You’ll never leave your room again you’ll be so relaxed!

Could Zen: Fish Sim be the future of therapy? We think so…
321310.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 希腊语, 日语, 韩语, 挪威语, 俄语, 简体中文, 瑞典语, 土耳其语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
